summary:
Sustainability professional with end-to-end experience in the Industry, managing sustainability topics with a pragmatic harmonized approach in cross-functional global teams; analytical, compassionate and driven; 
I take responsibility for the change management aspects and the timely release of programs with the eagerness to understand the broader organization processes to be improved.

patents.title: TARGETING LIGHT PROJECTION DEVICE FOR AN X-RAY EXAMINATION APPARATUS

profile_positions.description:
The Means & Methods team takes responsibility for defining, executing and implementing the means & methods for ReUse in Development & Engineering. 
To the team I own the overall plan and report progress. Indicate resources and critical dependencies and escalate timely for prioritzation.
Main focus is on the Mechanical Engineering cluster  while working actively together with Optics, Machine conditioning and Electronics ReUse teams to optimize.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project Leader Circular Engineering - Means & Methods

profile_positions.description:
Determine, align and deploy business processes for compliance to Substance Regulations with cross-functional stakeholders in the Global teams involving Suzhou and Latham staff. Execute in programs for timely completion with cross business teams.

Report to Director Design Quality Engineering and Global Head of quality to align program deliverables with PDLM global cross-functional projects. 

Influence and co-create with global corporate sustainability teams on substance management to achieve timely compliance to the ECHA-SCIP reporting obligation.
profile_positions.title: MRI Sustainability Engineer

profile_positions.description:
The Sustainability Lead has the Global responsibility to ensure that iXR products are designed, manufactured, supplied, installed, serviced and recycled according to the Philips sustainability policy and ensures that iXR products comply with regulatory requirements related to sustainability.
The Philips Cardiovascular products Azurion and Allura Xper have the leading position in the environmental Green Products program of Philips.

Define and maintain the iXR sustainability product roadmap to implement the Philips Sustainability
policy. Covering 
+ Circular economy.
+ ECO design, environmental design, 
+ and the regulatory sustainability requirements.
Regulations and policies including compliance to: ISO14001, ISO13485, 21CFR parts
801 (labeling), 820 (QSR), 1002 (records), ROHS, REACH, IEC60601-1-9
profile_positions.title: Sustainability Lead Interventional X-RAY , IGT-S

profile_positions.description:
2 main responsibities:
1. EcoDesign Facilitor for the Business Unit Interventional X-Ray,
+ Prepare for Circular Economy initiatives in co creation with the Ellen McArthur Foundation and the Refurbished Systems Business.
+ Mentor of Graduation on EcoDesign from Paris University.
+ (co) Mentor of PhD Graduation thesis from Tilburg University on Closed Loop Design.
from design to End of life overseeing the Environmental impact. Influence the Product Roadmap for EcoDesigned product creation to contribute to the Green Flagship and Green sales program.

2. As Special Assignment:
Prepare, specify and deploy the IT tooling to become compliant to Environmental legislation.
Establish and deploy the governance and maintenance policy w.r.t. functions and allocation.

Initiate and authorize Project plans and integrate into the overall business plan.

The project leader role in this matrix organization requires a high level of:
+ Understanding the detailed End User perspective, which are Engineers, system project leaders and Quality & regulatory officers.
+ Involvement of higher management to pro-actively address blocking issues and keep progress on agreed plans.
+ Excellent networking skills to establish a win-win situation for leading contributors in the project.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader Environmental Compliance & EcoDesign Facilitator Fixed Systems

profile_positions.description:
Mechatronic design as such including: 
+ FMEA, 
+ DMIAC, 
+ Weibull Reliability testing, 
+ Customer Usability, 
+ Design of Experiments, 
+ Design outsourcing
+ Pro-Engineer/Windchill CAD Mechanical Design.
+ Tolerance Analysis.
+ Friction and wear analysis.

Mechanical Discipline testing:
+ Lifetime testing definition including Test sequence and test setup preparation.
+ Test analysis and design improvement.
+ 3D measurements with high end Mitutoyo tooling.

Team leader for the development of a HighTech test-environment in production: 
This tooling included SW, HW and Mechanical design, integrated into a Mechatronic production facility on micron scale accuracy.

Production support including.
+ Root cause analysis with in depth understanding and analysis of tribilogical behavior in the Mechatronic system.
+ Trouble shoot series production Start-up to improve the failure rate and early failures. 
+ Perform Ishikawa root-cause analysis.
+ Apply MEDIC/DMAIC to improve the designs.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineer X-Ray diaphragms - Mechatronics.

volunteer_experiences.description:
Tandem cycling is a Global Paralympic sport. 
Short compilation of Silver medal results: http://youtu.be/Lsj0my1Exmk?t=1m26s
From 1997-2001 I was active on a tandem as the pilot for a visual impaired Top Sporter.
By competition on a global level we have been close to the qualification in the Sydney 2000 paralympics.
From 2006 onwards I became active as the trainer/ coach & teammanager of Alfred Stelleman.
In 2008 Alfred qualified for the Beijng paralympics.
During the qualifying process I have been the spokesmen and negotiator with NOC-NSF and the KNWU [Dutch Cycling Union]. This resulted in a second fair chance and a bike-off in several races. 
Finally Alfred won the Silver Medal in the Paralympic Time trial.

Representing the Bicycle community of around 800 active cyclists the Bicycle Commission of Philips Healthcare is established.

My personal interest was increased during a incident in 2008, which caused the fatal death of a cyclist.
After that event I searched contact with local goverments to improve the inherent safety of 2 Black-spots in the local surroundings of Best.
1. Spottersweg - Oirschotsedijk => creation of traffic sign.
 pareto of incidents dropped from 40/4 years to 0/2 years!
2. Gagel-Ringweg [Best]. This point was proven dangerous for cyclists and cars. My proposal was accepted and executed by the local government.
The result is that 2 major black-spots are eliminated to reduce future fatal incidents.

volunteer_experiences.role: Water and Electricity project leader-volunteer in Nepal
volunteer_experiences.description:
The local Medical Center was built by student of Dutch Universities.
They were missing experiences to establish good water supplies and electricity for the medical center.
The 10 weeks period resulted in a running water supply system and the contract with the energy company and High voltage Electric Infrastructure.
the result of this volunteering => The medical center is equiped with electricity & >1000 households benefit from this infrastructure.
From the World Health Organisation report:
electricity = light @ night = self study education for students => increase of education => increase of welfare & reduction of poverty
